verses.verse: And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> was strengthened <S%H2388><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> was with <S%H5973><s%> him, and magnified <S%H1431><s%> him exceedingly. <S%H4605><s%>

Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and to the judges, <S%H8199><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> governor <S%H5387><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers. <S%H1><s%>

So Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, went <S%H1980><s%> to the high place <S%H1116><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was at Gibeon; <S%H1391><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

But <S%H61><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had David <S%H1732><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> from Kirjath-jearim <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7157><s%> to the place which David <S%H1732><s%> had prepared <S%H3559><s%> for it: for <S%H3588><s%> he had pitched <S%H5186><s%> a tent <S%H168><s%> for it at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Moreover the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> had made, <S%H6213><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and Solomon <S%H8010><s%> and the congregation <S%H6951><s%> sought <S%H1875><s%> unto it.

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was at the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

In that <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> did God <S%H430><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> unto Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Ask <S%H7592><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> I shall give <S%H5414><s%> thee.

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto God, <S%H430><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> hast showed <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and hast made me to reign <S%H4427><s%> in his stead. <S%H8478><s%>

Now, <S%H6258><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> let thy promise <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> be established: <S%H539><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> hast made me king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> like the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> in multitude. <S%H7227><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> me now <S%H6258><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge, <S%H4093><s%> that I may go out <S%H3318><s%> and come in <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can judge <S%H8199><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy people, <S%H5971><s%> that is so great? <S%H1419><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> riches, <S%H6239><s%> wealth, <S%H5233><s%> or honor, <S%H3519><s%> nor the life <S%H5315><s%> of thine enemies, <S%H8130><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> hast asked <S%H7592><s%> long life; <S%H7227><s%> <S%H3117><s%> but hast asked <S%H7592><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge <S%H4093><s%> for thyself, that <S%H834><s%> thou mayest judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have made thee king: <S%H4427><s%>

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge <S%H4093><s%> is granted <S%H5414><s%> unto thee; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee riches, <S%H6239><s%> and wealth, <S%H5233><s%> and honor, <S%H3519><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> <S%H3651><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> have had <S%H1961><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have been before <S%H6440><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there any after <S%H310><s%> thee have <S%H1961><s%> the like. <S%H3651><s%>

Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from his journey to the high place <S%H1116><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was at Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and reigned <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> and horsemen: <S%H6571><s%> and he had <S%H1961><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> which he placed <S%H5117><s%> in the chariot <S%H7393><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> at Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> as plenteous as stones, <S%H68><s%> and cedar trees <S%H730><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> he as the sycamore trees <S%H8256><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the vale <S%H8219><s%> for abundance. <S%H7230><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had horses <S%H5483><s%> brought out <S%H4161><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and linen yarn: <S%H4723><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> merchants <S%H5503><s%> received <S%H3947><s%> the linen yarn <S%H4723><s%> at a price. <S%H4242><s%>

And they fetched up, <S%H5927><s%> and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> a chariot <S%H4818><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and a horse <S%H5483><s%> for a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty: <S%H2572><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> brought they out <S%H3318><s%> horses for all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and for the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Syria, <S%H758><s%> by their means. <S%H3027><s%>
